short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Checks a wallet's balance in Ether (ETH).

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension allows you to quickly check a cryptocurrency wallet balance in Ether (ETH). The information is powered by Etherscan.io APIs.

For more crypto related utilities and articles please visit https://fairdinkumcrypto.com.
